title: Hooked
description: Can love really conquer all?   Swearing. Sexual Content. Mature topics. Cliffhanger. Part Three of Four. Serial Romance. For 18+ Readers.  Charity’s sudden move to Hollywood blindsides her family. Hell, it blindsides her! Trying to stay by Brandon’s side is not as easy as either of them envisioned when the paparazzi and fans get in the way.  Can this small-town girl and the man who once broke her heart keep their love alive against the backdrop of a city and lifestyle that has no loyalties, and where nothing is guaranteed?  And while Brandon’s Hollywood estate is stunning and offers every comfort…Charity is not sure she can call this place home. The glitz and glamour is intoxicating, but will it overshadow their newly cemented relationship?  Nothing could have prepared Charity for what happens next…  You will love this contemporary new adult and college romance women's fiction story if you enjoy: - Women's fiction - Action and Adventure Romance Fiction - Celebrity Romance - Contemporary Romance - Billionaire Romance - New Adult and College Romance - Steamy Romance  Note. Swearing and sexual content. Cliffhanger. Serial romance Part 3 of 4
author: Audra Cole
